title: Blood scent
data:
{{obsolete}}

Monsters with the blood scent flag have improved ability to detect players and find a way to reach them.

Blood scent gives monsters 1 extra tracking range<ref>{{source ref|0.25.0|mon-pathfind.cc|52}}</ref>. In addition, [[Undead#Vampires|vampires]] will always wake at the scent of blood, while sleeping [[list of canines|hounds]] have a 66% chance of waking<ref>{{source ref|0.25.0|shout.cc|857}}</ref>.
